thread.section_title: Blinds 2go Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Blinds 2go | www.blinds-2go.co.uk | 37 of 2268
thread.title: Andrea

author: Andrea
title: Andrea
text: I first discovered Blinds2go in 2014, I lived in a house I desperately needed made to measure blinds. They were lovely artic white wooden and lasted up until now, no problems whatsoever! I moved out & left them at the house. I completely forgot about Blinds2go when I moved into my new property and had Quote: s from other companies in the £100's for 2 windows. Luckily for me I recommend Blinds2go go to family and friends and my best friend reminded me where she got her blind "Remember Blinds2go you recommend me" . I have done my 3 bed house including kitchen and two bathrooms again with Blinds2go. I'm going to estimate I paid around £400 in total. The quality is....**speechless. I will forever use Blinds2go and please if you're reading this and looking for made to measure curtains/blinds 100% you wont regret it! I would like to say so much...but I'm pretty rubbish with reviews.
